channel.title: Statik Little Nightmares on Spelskaparna
channel.description: Recent content in Statik Little Nightmares on Spelskaparna

item.description: Dave Mervik började sina bana i spelbranschen som testare hemma i England. I sverige fann han både kärleken privat och i arbetslivet. Nu jobbar han som narrative designer på Tarsier Studios. Länkar Acorn Electron Sega Master System Nintendo Warthog Rally Championship Richard Burns Rally Mace Griffin: Bounty Hunter Unreal Engine Travellers Tales TT Fusion Unity LEGO: Rock Band City of Metronome Little Big Planet Vita Hunger Teaser Little Nightmares Jean-Piere Jeunet Amelie Delicatessen The City of the Lost Children Statik Saw Project Syria Limbo Inside The Painted Bird Firewatch Thomas Grip
